mapper.select:
select
, (SELECT `name` FROM t_storehouse_info where mark_id = storehouse_id) AS houseName from t_delivery_area where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_delivery_area (mark_id, storehouse_id, province, city, limit_price, delivery_price, creator, create_time, server_status) values (#{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into t_delivery_area (mark_id, storehouse_id, province, city, area, limit_price, delivery_price, creator,create_time,server_status) values
(#{item.markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.limitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT})
